name: AUPrimaryCareFollowUpList
title: AU Primary Care Follow Up List
description: This profile defines a follow up list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.
purpose: This profile defines a follow up list structure that includes core localisation concepts for use in an Australian primary care practice-to-practice record transfer context.

element.definition: A list of clinical reminders or recalls for the individual
element.comment: To exchange a list of clinical reminders or recalls and their due dates so that the receiving clinic can incorporate them into a list of future activities required for the individual.
